line_1: Which when a mortal once attains,
Soon as the bark the sheltering bay attains,
line_2: Attentive still to soften all her pains,

line_1: Till to the Top the lab'ring Flood attains,
line_2: Swells o'er the Banks, and foams along the Plains.

line_1: Count all th' advantage prosp'rous Vice attains,
line_2: 'Tis but what Virtue flies from, and disdains;
Toils up the steep, the summit gains,

line_1: The Heart, and all its End at once attains.
line_2: Which, without passing thro' the Judgment, gains
